name: stiltedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is too formal and not smooth or natural: She spoke stiltedly because she was so nervous. "How are you feeling?" David asked, rather stiltedly. See
stilted
More examplesFewer examplesIn public we talked to each other, rather stiltedly perhaps, but we kept up the behaviour of a model family.The writing is stiltedly inauthentic.His speech sounded stiltedly rehearsed, and yet utterly heartfelt.
